pageContent: Introduction: Radical prostatectomy (RP) remains the main treatment method of localized prostate cancer. Satisfactory functional results after RP are essential for both urologist and patient. Preservation of sexual function, particularly orgasmic function (OF) after RP is of the utmost importance today for patients and their sexual partners.

metaData.source:
What men say about surviving prostate cancer: complexities represented in a decade of comments
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22297009/
